alert.note: Alert for Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:46PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lincoln and southwestern Spokane Counties through 630 PM PDT... At 545 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Cheney, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheney, Medical Lake, Reardan, Amber, Gravelles, Eleanor, Bluestem, Waukon, Tyler, and Edwall. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 250 and 266. U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 259 and 264. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
